text: Aage Niels Bohr (19 June 1922, Copenhagen - 8 September 2009, Copenhagen)https://news.yahoo.com/s/ap/20090911/ap_on_re_us/deaths;_ylt=AsTVeVDpTzJMtWpXYh1tBSsEtbAF was a Danish physicist and the fourth son of Margrethe Bohr and Niels Bohr. He won the Nobel Prize in 1975 for his works in physics: he discovered the connection of the collective motion and the single-motion particle in the atomic nucleus, and also for the development of the nuclear structure. He was a professor at University of Copenhagen. == References == Category:1922 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Scientists from Copenhagen Category:Danish physicists
title: Aage Niels Bohr
